mysql.description: Advanced values as per Terraform AWS RDS Module https://registry.terraform.io/modules/terraform-aws-modules/rds/aws/latest?tab=inputs

db_cluster_parameters.description: Map of DB cluster parameters to apply

db_instance_parameters.description: Map of DB instance parameters to apply

monitoring_interval.description: The interval, in seconds, between points when Enhanced Monitoring metrics are collected for instances. Set to 0  to disable

snapshot_identifier.description: Specifies whether or not to create this cluster from a snapshot. You can use either the name or ARN when specifying a DB cluster snapshot, or the ARN when specifying a DB snapshot

preferred_maintenance_window.description: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur, in (UTC)

preferred_backup_window.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created
